sentences.en: Aesthetic and affective aspects of the retrieved images predicted inspirational value.
sentences.cn: 审美和情感方面的灵感取自图像预测值.

sentences.en: Affective entropy is developed to express the specific extent of human emotion.
sentences.cn: 情感的熵值,表达出所构造的情感的细腻程度.

sentences.en: Affective thinking belongs to non - rational thinking and has its own characteristics.
sentences.cn: 情感思维属于非理性思维,有其自身的特性.

sentences.en: Affective wellhead was bred to be polychrome life and sincere life!
sentences.cn: 情感的水源,孕育了多彩的生活,至诚的生命!

sentences.en: For me, to came, affective involvement, also no - regrets, though just passenger.
sentences.cn: 对于我, 来过, 投入过, 也就无憾了, 虽然只是过客.

sentences.en: Hence, we can carry out the affective education from its basis? trusting.
sentences.cn: 因而, 可从情感教育的基础 —— 信任感入手.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the relationship between affective disorders and meteorological factors.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨情感性精神障碍与气象要素的关系.

sentences.en: Objective To explore criminal characteristics of patients with affective disorder.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨情感性精神障碍患者作案特征.

sentences.en: Objective: The aim is for the prevention of affective psychosis.
sentences.cn: 目的 　 为情感性精神病的预防提供参考.

sentences.en: Possible affective RE of observation target ( independent variable ) accounted for 280 items.
sentences.cn: 可能影响RE的观察指标 ( 自变量 ) 共280个.

sentences.en: Result: 9 patients with affective disorder presented after cardiac surgeries with CPB.
sentences.cn: 结果: 仅体外循环组9人出现术后轻度情感障碍.

sentences.en: The affective domain is similarly divided into a hierarchy of five categories.
sentences.cn: 情感表达范围也可以类似地分为五种等级.

sentences.en: The connotation of chemical quality education embody technical quality and affective quality.
sentences.cn: 化学素质教育的内涵包括学科素质及情感素质.

sentences.en: This condition is called seasonal affective disorder, or SAD for short.
sentences.cn: 这种病情叫做季节性情感失调症，或简称SAD。
